LanguageData.VPE_MindControlled.label: mind control
LanguageData.VPE_MindControlled.description: Magically-induced mind control, giving absolute control to another person.
LanguageData.VPE_MindScramble.label: mind scramble
LanguageData.VPE_MindScramble.description: Magically-induced mind scramble, caused by attempting to be two people at once.
LanguageData.VPE_PsychicGuidance.label: arcane guidance
LanguageData.VPE_PsychicGuide.label: arcane guide
LanguageData.VPE_PsychicGuide.description: Magically-induced absence of mind caused by giving guidance to another person.
LanguageData.VPE_Lucky.label: arcane luck
LanguageData.VPE_Lucky.description: Magically-induced luck that allows this person to always hit their target, and never be hit by their enemy.
LanguageData.VPE_UnLucky.label: arcane bad luck
LanguageData.VPE_UnLucky.description: Magically-induced bad luck that stops this person from ever hitting their target, whilst always being hit by the enemy.
